apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully portrays a couple with distinct skin tones, a man with a medium tone and a woman with a light tone, embracing with a vibrant red heart floating between them. The signature Apple design language imbues each figure with soft, rounded edges and a subtle 3D sheen, while the heart glows with a glossy finish and realistic lighting. This depiction on Apple devices conveys deep affection, commitment, and the joy of a loving relationship, often used to celebrate milestones or express romantic sentiments.
